Perform a cut operation along the Z axis by 0.6 units, resulting in a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side with a rectangular hole. The final shape has dimensions: * Height: 0.6 * Width: 0.5828 * Length: 0.5828 Note: Be sure to follow the instructions precisely, especially the orientation and scaling of the sketches, as well as the operation (cut) for part 2 to combine the parts correctly.</description>
